inclusion.criterion: Must understand the risks and the benefits/purpose of the study and provide signed and dated informed consent.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Must be 18 years at time of signing the informed consent form.
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Willing to participate in all required evaluations and procedures in the study including the ability to swallow pills without difficulty.
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Increasing or changing dose of topical therapy within 14 days of study day 0
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: History of any clinically significant (as determined by the investigators) cardiac, endocrinologic, pulmonary, neurologic, psychiatric, hepatic, renal, hematologic, immunologic, or other major uncontrolled disease.
exclusion.label: triggers
exclusion.evidence: Coronary artery disease with history of angioplasty in [**State 108**] one year ago

notes: Patient has a history of CAD and is currently experiencing abdominal pain, radiating to the left flank. She also has a large heterogeneous left upper abdominal mass consistent with pancreatic adenocarcinoma at the head of pancreas.
